resources.string: Welcome! Our app will guide you through the streets of Trento in search of places to explore and events to attend.
This icon will let you see interesting places on the map
This other icon will let you see interesting events on the map
See what others thought of this place and vote for it yourself.
Stories will let you create and share travels as you explore places and events in Trento
By clicking this symbol, you will be able to search for events or places or add new
